Title: Carry on Jatta 2
Writer: Naresh Kathuria (dialogue), Shreya Srivastava (story and screen play), Vaibhav Suman (story and screen play)
Actors: Gippy Grewal, Sonam Bajwa, Binnu Dhillon, Gurpreet Ghuggi
Plot: 'Carry On Jatta' is an Punjabi romantic comedy starring Gippy Grewal and Mahie Gill in the leading roles. It revolves around the confusing and comic events that arise after Jass lies to Mahie about his family in order to marry her.
